metadata.notes: Fines set by California AB 645. You may qualify for low-income OR public benefits reduction, not both. Community service cannot be combined with a reduced fine amount.

low_income.description: Pay half the standard fine amount

in_person.step_2: Choose Option 3 in Step 2 of the form
in_person.step_3: Bring form + proof of income to Human Services Agency at 170 Otis St, SF CA 94103
in_person.step_4: HSA will stamp the form if you qualify
in_person.step_5: Bring ticket + stamped form to SFMTA Customer Service Center at 11 S. Van Ness Ave, SF CA 94103

public_benefits.description: Pay one-fifth of the standard fine amount
qualifying_programs: Women, Infants & Children (WIC) Supplemental Nutrition Program
SFMTA Lifeline card (Temporary Lifeline card NOT accepted)
People experiencing homelessness who visited a Coordinated Entry Point in past 6 months

steps: Visit the public benefits / community service online form
Fill in form including proof of benefits

in_person_with_proof.step_3: Bring ticket + form + benefits card to SFMTA Customer Service Center at 11 S. Van Ness Ave, SF CA 94103

in_person_without_proof.step_3: Take form to Human Services Agency (170 Otis St) for verification and stamp
in_person_without_proof.step_4: Bring ticket + stamped form to SFMTA Customer Service Center at 11 S. Van Ness Ave, SF CA 94103

community_service.description: Perform community service instead of paying the fine
community_service.enrollment_fee_notes: Check only — no cash accepted for mail-in applications
community_service.requirement: Half of hours must be with SFMTA or SF Public Works

steps: Visit the public benefits / community service online form

in_person.address: 11 S. Van Ness Ave, San Francisco, CA 94103
steps: Bring application + speeding ticket to SFMTA Customer Service Center

by_mail.address: SFMTA Customer Service Center, c/o ASE Community Service, 11 South Van Ness Ave, San Francisco, CA 94103
steps: Follow instructions and keep a copy for your records
Include a check for $29 enrollment fee
Mail check + application to the address above

contact.customer_service_center: 11 S. Van Ness Ave, San Francisco, CA 94103
